[{"id":"142","id_user":"1","id_parent":"0","tenbaiviet_vi":"C\u0102N H\u1ed8 \u0110\u1ea0T PH\u01af\u1edaC THE RIVANA","tenbaiviet_en":"","tenbaiviet_cn":null,"tenbaiviet_jp":null,"mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":null,"mota_jp":null,"noidung_vi":"<h2>T\u1ed4NG QUAN C\u0102N H\u1ed8 THE RIVANA<\/h2>\r\n\r\n<section data-element_type=\"section\" data-id=\"ba4d762\">\r\n<p><a href=\"http:\/\/rivana.vn\/\">C\u0103n h\u1ed9 The Rivana<\/a>&nbsp;n\u1eb1m ngay m\u1eb7t ti\u1ec1n Qu\u1ed1c l\u1ed9 13,&nbsp;Ph\u01b0\u1eddng V\u0129nh Ph&uacute;, Th&agrave;nh Ph\u1ed1 Thu\u1eadn An, T\u1ec9nh B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng. \u0110&acirc;y l&agrave; d\u1ef1 &aacute;n c\u0103n h\u1ed9 chung c\u01b0 \u0111\u1ea7u tay c\u1ee7a&nbsp;<a href=\"http:\/\/rivana.vn\/\">ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0 \u0110\u1ea1t Ph\u01b0\u1edbc<\/a>, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0 b&agrave;i b\u1ea3n, n\u1eb1m tr&ecirc;n&nbsp;khu \u0111\u1ea5t r\u1ed9ng g\u1ea7n 12,000m2 v\u1edbi m\u1eadt \u0111\u1ed9 x&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng ch\u1ec9 38%. T\u1eeb v\u1ecb tr&iacute; d\u1ef1 &aacute;n&nbsp;<a href=\"http:\/\/rivana.vn\/\">The Rivana<\/a>, c\u01b0 d&acirc;n c&oacute; th\u1ec3 nhanh ch&oacute;ng k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i \u0111\u1ebfn trung t&acirc;m TP.HCM th&ocirc;ng qua tr\u1ee5c Qu\u1ed1c L\u1ed9 13, b&ecirc;n c\u1ea1nh nh\u1eefng ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch hi\u1ec7n h\u1eefu xung quanh nh\u01b0: \u0110\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc Lu\u1eadt TP.HCM, B\u1ec7nh vi\u1ec7n qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf H\u1ea1nh Ph&uacute;c, Coopmart B&igrave;nh Tri\u1ec7u&hellip;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li>\r\n\t<p>Th\u1eddi gian x&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng:Th&aacute;ng 12\/2020<\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li>\r\n\t<p>S\u1ed1 Block: 02<\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li>\r\n\t<p>S\u1ed1 t\u1ea7ng: 26<\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li>\r\n\t<p>S\u1ed1 c\u0103n h\u1ed9: 1020<\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li>\r\n\t<p>S\u1ed1 shophouse: 15<\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li>\r\n\t<p>M\u1eadt \u0111\u1ed9 x&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng: 38%<\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li>\r\n\t<p>Di\u1ec7n t&iacute;ch c\u0103n h\u1ed9: 50-95m2<\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li>\r\n\t<p>Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0:&nbsp;<strong>\u0110\u1ea0T PH\u01af\u1edaC<\/strong><\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"864\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/6(1).jpg\" width=\"1536\" \/>\r\n\t<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n\t<\/figure>\r\n\r\n\t<h2>V\u1eca TR&Iacute; C\u0102N H\u1ed8 THE RIVANA\u200b<\/h2>\r\n\r\n\t<section data-element_type=\"section\" data-id=\"21542e3\">\r\n\t<p>V\u1ecb tr&iacute; d\u1ef1 &aacute;n The Rivana B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng t\u1ecda l\u1ea1c ngay tr&ecirc;n m\u1eb7t ti\u1ec1n Qu\u1ed1c L\u1ed9 13, Ph\u01b0\u1eddng V\u0129nh Ph&uacute;, TP. Thu\u1eadn An, T\u1ec9nh B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng.\u0110&acirc;y \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c xem l&agrave; &ldquo;v\u1ecb tr&iacute; v&agrave;ng&rdquo; li\u1ec1n k\u1ec1 trung t&acirc;m h&agrave;nh ch&iacute;nh c\u1ee7a TP. Thu\u1eadn An, c&aacute;ch \u0111\u1ecba ph\u1eadn TP.HCM ch\u1ec9 kho\u1ea3ng 15 ph&uacute;t \u0111i xe.<br \/>\r\n\t<a href=\"http:\/\/rivana.vn\/\">D\u1ef1 &aacute;n The Rivana<\/a>&nbsp;c&ograve;n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c h\u01b0\u1edfng l\u1ee3i t\u1eeb giao th&ocirc;ng khi k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i th&ocirc;ng su\u1ed1t v\u1edbi c&aacute;c tuy\u1ebfn \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng quan tr\u1ecdng nh\u01b0 \u0110\u1ea1i l\u1ed9 B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng, \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng Th\u1ee7 Khoa Hu&acirc;n, \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng Nguy\u1ec5n Th\u1ecb Minh Khai, \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng L&ecirc; H\u1ed3ng Phong, \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng Ph\u1ea1m V\u0103n \u0110\u1ed3ng,&hellip;<br \/>\r\n\tNh\u1edd n\u1eb1m ngay v\u1ecb tr&iacute; n&agrave;y, d\u1ef1 &aacute;n The Rivana c&ograve;n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1eeba h\u01b0\u1edfng nhi\u1ec1u thu\u1eadn l\u1ee3i t\u1eeb s\u1ef1 ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n nhanh ch&oacute;ng c\u1ee7a TP. Thu\u1eadn An, t\u1ec9nh B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<p>\u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c bi\u1ebft, t\u1eeb \u0111\u1ea7u n\u0103m 2020, Thu\u1eadn An \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph&ecirc; duy\u1ec7t th&agrave;nh 1 trong 3 th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 tr\u1ef1c thu\u1ed9c t\u1ec9nh B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng. T\u1eeb \u0111&oacute;, h\u1ea1 t\u1ea7ng c\u1ee7a th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 \u0111&atilde; c&oacute; nh\u1eefng b\u01b0\u1edbc nh\u1ea3y v\u1ecdt v\u1edbi c&aacute;c d\u1ef1 &aacute;n t\u1ea7m c\u1ee1 nh\u01b0:<br \/>\r\n\t&ndash; M\u1edf r\u1ed9ng v&agrave; n&acirc;ng c\u1ea5p \u0111\u1ea1i l\u1ed9 B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng l&ecirc;n 120m<br \/>\r\n\t&ndash; M\u1edf r\u1ed9ng tuy\u1ebfn qu\u1ed1c l\u1ed9 13 \u0111o\u1ea1n TP.HCM \u0111i B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng l&ecirc;n th&agrave;nh 8 l&agrave;n xe<br \/>\r\n\tTheo kh\u1ea3o s&aacute;t, Thu\u1eadn An \u0111ang l&agrave; khu v\u1ef1c c&oacute; t\u1ed1c \u0111\u1ed9 t\u0103ng gi&aacute; b&aacute;n v&agrave; gi&aacute; thu&ecirc; b\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ed9ng s\u1ea3n cao nh\u1ea5t t\u1ea1i t\u1ec9nh B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7n nay. C&aacute;c d\u1ef1 &aacute;n chung c\u01b0 t\u1ea1i th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 Thu\u1eadn An, \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t l&agrave; tr&ecirc;n tr\u1ee5c qu\u1ed1c l&ocirc; 13 (\u0111\u1ea1i l\u1ed9 B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng) hi\u1ec7n \u0111ang&nbsp;s\u1edf h\u1eefu m\u1ee9c gi&aacute; cho thu&ecirc; c\u0103n h\u1ed9 h\u1ea5p d\u1eabn nh\u1ea5t, cao g\u1ea5p \u0111&ocirc;i D\u0129 An, g\u1ea5p r\u01b0\u1ee1i Th\u1ee7 D\u1ea7u M\u1ed9t v&agrave; g\u1ea7n ti\u1ec7m c\u1eadn v\u1edbi gi&aacute; thu&ecirc; m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 chung c\u01b0 t\u1ea1i&nbsp;khu \u0110&ocirc;ng TP.HCM.<\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"1024\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/3(13).jpg\" width=\"961\" \/>\r\n\t<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n\t<\/figure>\r\n\r\n\t<h2>TI\u1ec6N &Iacute;CH C\u0102N H\u1ed8 THE RIVANA<\/h2>\r\n\r\n\t<p><a href=\"http:\/\/rivana.vn\/\">C\u0103n h\u1ed9 The Rivana B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng<\/a>&nbsp;c&oacute; di\u1ec7n t&iacute;ch khu&ocirc;n vi&ecirc;n l&ecirc;n \u0111\u1ebfn g\u1ea7n 12,000m2. Trong khi \u0111&oacute;, m\u1eadt \u0111\u1ed9 x&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng ch\u1ec9 chi\u1ebfm 38%, ph\u1ea7n l\u1edbn di\u1ec7n t&iacute;ch \u0111\u1ea5t c&ograve;n l\u1ea1i d&agrave;nh cho ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch n\u1ed9i khu. Do \u0111&oacute;, d\u1ef1 &aacute;n The Rivana r\u1ea5t ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng gia \u0111&igrave;nh tr\u1ebb, hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i, h\u01b0\u1edbng \u0111\u1ebfn cu\u1ed9c s\u1ed1ng chan h&ograve;a c&ugrave;ng c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng v&agrave; thi&ecirc;n nhi&ecirc;n.<\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<p>C&aacute;c ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch n\u1ed5i b\u1eadt t\u1ea1i&nbsp;<a href=\"http:\/\/rivana.vn\/\">d\u1ef1 &aacute;n The Rivana Thu\u1eadn An<\/a>&nbsp;d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trang b\u1ecb l&ecirc;n \u0111\u1ebfn 25 ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch, trong \u0111&oacute; ph\u1ea3i k\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ebfn nh\u01b0:&nbsp;S\u1ea3nh \u0111&oacute;n,&nbsp;Ti\u1ec3u c\u1ea3nh th&aacute;c n\u01b0\u1edbc,&nbsp;S\u1ea3nh l\u1ec5 t&acirc;n,&nbsp;Khu v\u1ef1c \u0111&oacute;n tr\u1ea3 kh&aacute;ch,&nbsp;S&acirc;n b&oacute;ng r\u1ed5,&nbsp;S&acirc;n ch\u01a1i tr\u1ebb em,&nbsp;Khu v\u1ef1c \u0111a ch\u1ee9c n\u0103ng,&nbsp;Khu n\u01b0\u1edbng BBQ ngo&agrave;i tr\u1eddi,&nbsp;\u0110\u01b0\u1eddng ch\u1ea1y b\u1ed9 ngo&agrave;i tr\u1eddi,&nbsp;H\u1ed3 b\u01a1i tr&agrave;n b\u1edd,&nbsp;H\u1ed3 b\u01a1i cho tr\u1ebb em,&nbsp;B\u1ed3n ng&acirc;m ch&acirc;n,&nbsp;H\u1ed3 s\u1ee5c Jacuzzi,&nbsp;Clubhouse,&nbsp;Ph&ograve;ng Gym&hellip;.<\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"576\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/9.jpg\" width=\"1024\" \/>\r\n\t<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n\t<\/figure>\r\n\r\n\t<h2>THI\u1ebeT K\u1ebe C\u0102N H\u1ed8 THE RIVANA<\/h2>\r\n\r\n\t<section data-element_type=\"section\" data-id=\"dd5ca8b\">\r\n\t<p>D\u1ef1 &aacute;n C\u0103n h\u1ed9 The Rivana \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c x&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng theo d\u1ea1ng s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp &ldquo;Module&rdquo;, m\u1ed7i c\u0103n h\u1ed9 l&agrave; m\u1ed9t &ldquo;Module&rdquo; nh\u1ecf trong t\u1ed5ng th\u1ec3 to&agrave;n b\u1ed9 c&aacute;c c\u0103n h\u1ed9 The Rivana. M\u1ed7i &ldquo;Moldule&rdquo; \u0111&oacute; l\u1ea1i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c &nbsp;thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf t\u1ec9 m\u1ec9 theo phong c&aacute;ch t\u1ed1i gi\u1ea3n hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i &ldquo;Minimalism&rdquo;.<\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<p>Phong c&aacute;ch t\u1ed1i gi\u1ea3n ch&uacute; tr\u1ecdng vi\u1ec7c gi\u1ea3m thi\u1ec3u t\u1ed1i \u0111a vi\u1ec7c trang tr&iacute; trong kh&ocirc;ng gian n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t, k\u1ebft h\u1ee3p s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng c&oacute; ch\u1ee7 \u0111&iacute;ch &nbsp;c&aacute;c m\u1ea3ng t\u01b0\u1eddng, s&agrave;n v&agrave; &aacute;nh s&aacute;ng t\u1ef1 nhi&ecirc;n ch&iacute;nh l&agrave; nh\u1eefng y\u1ebfu t\u1ed1 quan tr\u1ecdng l&agrave;m n&ecirc;n v\u1ebb \u0111\u1eb9p c\u1ee7a phong c&aacute;ch t\u1ed1i gi\u1ea3n<\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<p>V\u1edbi nh\u1ecbp \u0111\u1ed9 cu\u1ed9c s\u1ed1ng ng&agrave;y c&agrave;ng nhanh, m\u1ed9t kh&ocirc;ng gian tho&aacute;ng \u0111&atilde;ng, tr&agrave;n ng\u1eadp &aacute;nh s&aacute;ng tr\u1edf th&agrave;nh \u0111i\u1ec1u m&agrave; m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi m\u01a1 \u01b0\u1edbc. Platon, nh&agrave; tri\u1ebft h\u1ecdc Hy l\u1ea1p c\u1ed5 \u0111\u1ea1i, \u0111&atilde; n&oacute;i: &ldquo;C&aacute;i \u0111\u1eb9p c\u1ee7a phong c&aacute;ch, c\u1ee7a s\u1ef1 h&agrave;i ho&agrave;, duy&ecirc;n d&aacute;ng v&agrave; nh\u1ecbp nh&agrave;ng ph\u1ee5 thu\u1ed9c v&agrave;o s\u1ef1 \u0111\u01a1n gi\u1ea3n&rdquo;<\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"921\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/8(1).jpg\" width=\"933\" \/>\r\n\t<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n\t<\/figure>\r\n\r\n\t<p><em><strong>Ngu\u1ed3n:&nbsp;https:\/\/rivana.vn\/<\/strong><\/em><\/p>\r\n\t<\/section>\r\n\t<\/section>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n<\/section>","noidung_en":"","noidung_cn":null,"noidung_jp":null,"tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":null,"tags_jp":null,"seo_name":"can-ho-dat-phuoc-the-rivana","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"5","icon":"1691637917_1.jpg","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"dowload_text":"","duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1691650936","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"51","step":"3","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"C\u0102N H\u1ed8 \u0110\u1ea0T PH\u01af\u1edaC THE RIVANA","seo_title_en":"","seo_title_cn":null,"seo_title_jp":null,"seo_keywords_vi":"C\u0102N H\u1ed8 \u0110\u1ea0T PH\u01af\u1edaC THE RIVANA","seo_keywords_en":"","seo_keywords_cn":null,"seo_keywords_jp":null,"seo_description_vi":"C\u0102N H\u1ed8 \u0110\u1ea0T PH\u01af\u1edaC THE RIVANA","seo_description_en":"","seo_description_cn":null,"seo_description_jp":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"1","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","opt3":"0","opt4":"0","opt5":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_1_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_1_jp":null,"thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_2_jp":null,"thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_3_jp":null,"google_map":"","is_dongdau":"0","time_dongdau":"0"}]
